-class Animal:%0A    def __init__(self, species: str, sound: str):%0A        self.species: str = species%0A        self.sound: str = sound%0A        self.age: int = 0%0A%0A    def __str__(self) -%3E str:%0A        return f%22%7Bself.specie%7D:%7Bself.age%7D:%7Bself.sound%7D%22%0A    %0A    def ageBy(self, increment: int) -%3E None:%0A        if self.age == 4:%0A            print(f%22warning: %7Bself.species%7D morreu%22)%0A            return%0A        self.age+=increment%0A        if self.age %3E= 4:%0A            self.age = 4%0A            print(f%22warning: %7Bself.species%7D morreu.%22)%0A%0A    def ismakeSound(self) -%3E str:%0A        if self.age == 0:%0A            return %22---%22%0A        elif self.age %3E= 4:%0A            return %22RIP%22%0A        else:%0A            return self.sound%0A    %0Adef main():%0A        animal: Animal = Animal(%22%22,%22%22)%0A%0A        while True:%0A            line: str = input()%0A            print(%22$%22+line)%0A            args: list%5Bstr%5D = line.split(%22 %22)%0A%0A            if args%5B0%5D == %22end%22:%0A                break%0A            elif args%5B0%5D == %22init%22:%0A                species: str = args%5B1%5D%0A                sound: str = args%5B2%5D%0A                animal= Animal(species, sound)%0A            elif args%5B0%5D == %22grow%22:%0A                increment: int= int(args%5B1%5D)%0A                animal.ageBy(increment)%0A            elif args%5B0%5D == %22noise%22:%0A                print(animal.ismakeSound())%0A            elif args%5B0%5D == %22show%22:%0A                print(animal)%0A%0Amain()%0A
